desc: KNM Industries focuses on of off-road tracks, trails and tons of other uses for off-road/ontrack communications. Check out our Off Road Headsets, Handheld Radios, Mobile Radios, Waterproof Radios, Intercoms, Helmet Kits, Cables, Antennas, Mounting Solutions, Cables, and even build your own off road kit!

layout.text: KNM Industries comes from a long line of communications & electrical backgrounds.
